Sentence: A re-elected Turnbull Coalition Government will invest $5 million towards the construction of the Sunshine Coast Community Sporting Hub delivering jobs and growth in the electorate of Fisher.
This commitment will deliver a multipurpose sport and community centre that will benefit the entire Sunshine Coast community.
The $22.5 million project includes a high performance sports and medical centre, a community sports and recreation club and short-term accommodation.
These new sporting facilities will be a destination for local, national and international athletes and sporting teams across all codes.
Importantly, the Sporting Hub will be an economic boon for the region creating new local jobs in recreation and sport.
It will help address the need for improved community infrastructure to support the healthy population growth on the Sunshine Coast.
This is a great initiative that has long been supported by LNP candidate Andrew Wallace, a tireless advocate for improved community infrastructure and services across the electorate of Fisher.
Investing in the Sunshine Coast Community Sporting Hub demonstrates how a Turnbull Government is committed to growing more vibrant communities and delivering jobs and growth.
